original_text: Likewise also was not Rahab the harlot justified by works, when she had received the messengers, and had sent them out another way?
korean_text: 또 이와 같이 기생 라합이 사자들을 접대하여 다른 길로 나가게 할 때에 행함으로 의롭다 하심을 받은 것이 아니냐

sentences.original_text: Likewise also was not Rahab the harlot
when she had received the messengers
and had sent them out another way?
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들을 다른 길로 보내었을 때에
